page.title: 17POLICING LEAMINGTON SPA.
page.content: The crime rate in Leamington Spa is not high compared to Birmingham or London but it is the second highest in Warwickshire (Nuneaton first, Rugby third, Stratford fourth). The crimes recorded number 8 000 to 9 000 incidents each year. The detection rate is 40%. Murders in Warwickshire average 3 or 4 each year. Theft in shops is quite a big problem but 99% of this crime is detected by the police, but not all cases are reported. Drugs (cocaine,marijuana, cannabis) are fairly common in Leamington and a lot of glue sniffing goes on. There are 900 police in the force and 20% of them are women. There are 5 departments and the operational area is 48 square miles.
